examples: The singer's acoustic performance showcased her raw talent, captivating the audience with the purity and emotion of her voice in its most authentic form.

words.defineEn: to attract someone by being irresistibly appealing
words.defineVi: để thu hút ai đó bằng cách hấp dẫn không thể cưỡng lại

words.defineEn: to fully satisfy a desire or need, such as food or pleasure, often beyond capacity

words.defineEn: have at least three points in common with
words.defineVi: có ít nhất ba điểm chung với

words.defineVi: tham gia vào một giải đấu cho một mục đích chung

examples: No matter how much wealth or power we may accumulate in life, in the end, we all face the same fate.
The author took a chance by writing a book on an unconventional topic, but she knew that if you do not speculate, you cannot accumulate.

The scholar had spent years accumulating knowledge and wisdom from books, but he understood that a man is happy when he has books, but happier still when he does not need them - when he can rely on his own intellect and experience to navigate the world.
Oxygen accumulates in the atmosphere.
He had accumulated an immense vocabulary.
words.defineEn: to collect an increasing amount of something over time
words.defineVi: để thu thập một lượng ngày càng tăng của một cái gì đó theo thời gian

examples: So that and all the progress that was accomplished during his administration is not obviated by the fact that Donald Trump emerged after.
